name: Grands!® Easy Taco Melts
author: Pillsbury
summary: Taco flavor wrapped in an empanada, and it's ready to eat in 30 minutes!
ingredients: 1 pound (at least 80%) ground beef, cooked, drained
1 ½ cups Old El Paso® Thick 'n Chunky Salsa
1 (16.3 ounce) can Pillsbury® Grands!® refrigerated biscuits
½ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese or Mexican cheese blend
directions: In 10-inch nonstick skillet, mix cooked beef and 1/2 cup of the salsa
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until hot
Spoon 1/3 cup meat mixture and 1 tablespoon cheese onto center of each round
Fold dough in half over filling; press to seal
Bake at 375 degrees F 9 to 14 minutes or until golden brown
